summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganBlurred Matte Lip Plump from about-face is a unique, creamy soft-matte lip color that helps to moisturize + plump your pout for a fuller look.
details: DetailsBenefitsBREAKING THE NORM: Infused with ingredients that help lips feel smootherBlurred Matte Lip Plump tingles + cools as it glides on like butterPacked with powerful pigments that don't dry down or disappear, but endure throughout the day for buildable, plush coverage that lastsFeaturesAVAILABLE IN: Six plush, saturated shadesItem 2639555IngredientsPetit Rouge: Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6 Lake), Menthoxypropanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides).

reviews.headline: Best feeling and looking lipstick
reviews.comments: Honestly, this feels amazing on my lips. Weightless, not drying, and somehow cooling even after application? My biggest issue,  my only issue is that it definitely transfers. Going to see if I can find a way for powder to work.

reviews.headline: Smearable black junk where the red?
reviews.comments: I bought true red. What I got was black red and slippery heavy hunky junk. It's so thick it smeared upon applying, the color looks nothing like as shown, also false advertising w the video. None of the colors look like that. When I put on true red, it should not be the color of a blackberry. Also no plump just soft extremely smearable gunk. If you want plum go w buxom. If you have dark to black skin you might like this product because they are extremely dark and saturated, but still thick and smeary so I really don't recommend you try it. I mean I have a lot of buxom matte plumps, shine plumps, too faced, and my whole box is filled w my glosses , lipsticks, plumper, colors, matte plumbers . My favorites are buxom and I shouldn't say it on here but JEFFree Starr. Love his lipsticks . Love! Nothing like them on earth. I only wear shades or red btw. Buxom has some great plumper reds I wear them very often. I even got some random liquid lip stuff on here I love. This is going back and I rarely return lipsticks eps red it's not red it's black omg

reviews.headline: Not transfer proof
reviews.comments: Upon application- it feels quite velvety and nice. It gets a bit clumpy if you build up intensity/do multiple layers. My biggest issue is that it smears! If a strand of my hair gets caught on my lips, I end up with lipstick stains all over my face.

reviews.headline: I would buy more
reviews.comments: 4/5 star because their 's no plumping. Still a very good product I love the way it feels like velvety or a mousse on the lips. Lasts all day feels great on and looks good.

reviews.headline: Velvety blur
reviews.comments: Amazing velvety texture that doesn't dry lips. Builable color. Most surprising is the beautiful stain it wears off to or can be blotted to; it creates that blurry lip look I never could achieve before… and it also doesn't get crumbly like matte lippies can. I got Kismet, a peachy color that's not too orange, brown or nude. Also Petit Rouge, a cool cherry red that can be blotted to a gorgeous stain. Kismet is my favorite as it's rather unique.

reviews.headline: New Favorite Lipstick!
reviews.comments:
I got the Petit Rouge shade. Soo comfortable and soft. The tingle feels nice and minty but its subtle. 
It's a red lipstick but 1000% better! 
I hope they expand this line and give us more shades.

reviews.headline: Perfect blurred lip
reviews.comments: Thin soft formula that is easily and precisely applied with the applicator.  Lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: The colors perfect. I have been searching for the perfect color for my lips. I'm very happy with the product and the price.

reviews.headline: Cool Tones, Please!
reviews.comments: The plumping and blurring effect these give are perfect! They feel more comfortable and last longer than many stains I own as well. I would LOVE to see some desaturated/cool-toned browns, mauves, and even a gray or blue in this formula. I bought Opulent, which leans more on the red side of mahogany than brown. I also swatched Side-Eye in store, but it basically looked orange on my skin tone. Give us more, please!

reviews.headline: Love a matte blurred lip
reviews.comments: Saw this on Ulta's site and knew it needed to be in my collection. It applies like a dream, though because of the plumping aspect, there is a mintiness some may not like. I bought Side-Eye and the color is a nice nude but it does fade to an orange-ish shade I'm not a huge fan of. Wish it was maybe less warm and more neutral.  Will be buying another shade, though.

reviews.headline: Great peach lipstick
reviews.comments: I was really impressed with this lipstick. It goes on smooth and creamy and not drying at all in the last long time. A great peach color

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Feel velvetty smooth but looks matte, lips do look plumper,

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments: THE BEST LIP I EVER HAD, I HACE LIKE 25 FIVE IN MY ROOM AND THIS IS MY NEW FAV

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Halsey did the thing with this one! I am a huge fan of about-face makeup. It is great quality at an affordable price point. But this lip product especially is out of this world. It lasts all day and really blurs the lips. There is a slight tingling sensation when you first put the product on but it isnt overwhelming in any way and goes away over time. I got one shade to try and went back the next week to get two more. 10/10 recommend! (Also pairs great with their lip gloss)

reviews.headline: Go to lip
reviews.comments: I love a good matte lip cream and usually go with the ones by NYX, but when I saw this was plumping and matte, I IMMEDIATELY added it to cart. It's super pigmented, super comfortable, doesn't feel sticky or drying, and is about 98% transfer proof. The color lasted me all day with only one application even while I was eating and drinking. I will be buying every shade.

reviews.headline: Stays all day
reviews.comments: I've surprised myself with how often I reach for this. The texture is so smooth and creamy, with a light tingly plumping effect. The best part of this product is that is that it really does stay all day. I wore this to a 12 hour work day, did not reapply once, and still had color on at the end of the day. Just lowkey a really great product.

reviews.headline: beautiful look great formula
reviews.comments: almost every blurring matte lipstick ive tried has been at little bit drying but there is nothing drying about this formula. my lips feel so soft and moisturizer after putting this on. the minty tingle is very faint and not overpowering like it is with some other plumping lip products. color is stunning and applies very evenly. i got Side Eye and it is a bit more of a brown than a nude i feel, but i still love the color.

reviews.headline: amazing as always
reviews.comments: this has got to be my absolute favorite drop from about face so far! been looking for the perfect blurred matte look for years and its finally here < 3 non-drying and such a comfortable formula! obsessed.

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: I got Petit Rouge and this shade is BEAUTIFUL on my very dark skin. It goes on extremely creamy and there isnt very much transfer. It dries matte yet feathery and its not sticky. Makes my lips feel hydrated and soft. Looking forward to buying more colors.

reviews.headline: my new hyperfixation
reviews.comments: I love love lovveeee this product! I am normally a lip gloss girl and I hate matte lip products BUT this is different. it does not make your lips look like raisins and it is sooo comfortable. Plus it stains your lips and last forever. This formula beats out my high end lip products. 1000/10

faceoff_positive.comments:
I LOVE this formula! The lightweight, creamy texture glides on so smoothly, and the finish is incredible — not sticky at all. As the formula wears in, it leaves a subtle tint that lasts, making it the perfect low-maintenance lip product.

From a plumping perspective, it gives a very light plump, nowhere near the intensity of the Too Faced glosses (which I personally love). If you're more on the sensitive side, I think you'd really enjoy this one!

For application, I lightly dot it on my lips and then tap it in with my finger. It helps diffuse the formula, giving a natural, lived-in look.
faceoff_positive.headline: BLURRED MATTE  IS THE NEXT BIG THING!

faceoff_negative.headline: Smearable black junk where the red?
